import React,{Component} from 'react' import "./Today.css" import SideBody from './sideBody/SideBody' import News from './news/News.js' import axios from 'axios'; class Today extends Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { loadingText:"updating...", searchByLL:"", id:"", city:"" } this.findCoordinates=this.findCoordinates.bind(this) this.algito=this.algito.bind(this) this.convertionOfURL=this.convertionOfURL.bind(this) } algito = () => { const something="algo"; return something} convertionOfURL(a,b){ a = this.state.todayInfo.current.condition.icon; b = a.substring(2, 60) return b } findCoordinates () { const client = require('..'); const apixu = new client.Apixu(); apixu.conditions().then((conditions) => { for (const i in conditions) { console.log(conditions[i].code, conditions[i].day); } }, (err) => { console.log(err.code, err.message); }); }; componentDidMount() { navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition((pos) => { this.setState({ uri:'http://api.apixu.com/v1/current.json?key=82fe923258fa4530a5e235322192604&q=' + pos.coords.latitude.toString() + "," + pos.coords.longitude.toString() }); fetch(this.state.uri).then((res) => res.json()) .then((todayInfo) => this.setState({ todayInfo, currentTodayIcon:"" })) .catch((err) => console.log(err.message)) }) } componentDidUpdate() { } render () { {this.findCoordinates()} return(

dsd{this.algito()} {this.state.todayInfo ? this.state.todayInfo.location.name : this.state.loading}, {this.state.todayInfo ? this.state.todayInfo.location.region : this.state.loading}
